[Azarketi Weapon Aptitude](/Feats.aspx?ID=2675) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 395, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 5</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Azarketi Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2671)

</column>

---

You become familiar with using your weapons both in and out of water. Whenever you critically hit using an [azarketi](/Traits.aspx?ID=336) weapon or one of the weapons listed in Azarketi Weapon Familiarity, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) effect.
